meanings.definition: A type of gas-filled tube used as a controlled rectifier in electronic circuits.
meanings.sent1: The technician replaced the old ignitrons in the circuit with new ones.
meanings.sent2: The factory ordered a shipment of ignitrons for their machinery.
meanings.sent3: The ignitrons in the circuit decided to throw a party when the power was off.
meanings.sent4: The ignitrons hummed softly, like a choir of tiny electronic angels.
meanings.sent5: The bright glow of the ignitrons illuminated the room, creating a futuristic atmosphere.
